quote: Death is not the greatest loss in life. The greatest loss is what dies inside us while we live.
name: Norman Cousins

quote: Love has no age, no limit; and no death.
name: John Galsworthy

quote: While I thought that I was learning how to live, I have been learning how to die.
name: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: If we lose love and self respect for each other, this is how we finally die.
name: Maya Angelou

quote: The life of the dead is placed in the memory of the living.
name: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: Cowards die many times before their deaths; the valiant never taste of death but once.
name: William Shakespeare

quote: For life and death are one, even as the river and the sea are one.
name: Khalil Gibran

quote: Death and love are the two wings that bear the good man to heaven.
name: Michelangelo

quote: It is not death that a man should fear, but he should fear never beginning to live.
name: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Death may be the greatest of all human blessings.
name: Socrates

quote: The idea is to die young as late as possible.
name: Ashley Montagu

quote: Absolute silence leads to sadness. It is the image of death.
name: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quote: Everybody wants to go to heaven, but nobody wants to die.
name: Unknown

quote: A revolution is a struggle to the death between the future and the past.
name: Fidel Castro

quote: Don't send me flowers when I'm dead. If you like me, send them while I'm alive.
name: Brian Clough

quote: As a well-spent day brings happy sleep, so a life well spent brings happy death.
name: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: Death is nothing, but to live defeated and inglorious is to die daily.
name: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: Death is the solution to all problems. No man - no problem.
name: Joseph Stalin

quote: Life and death are one thread, the same line viewed from different sides.
name: Lao Tzu

quote: In this world nothing can be said to be certain, except death and taxes.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Nothing is more sad than the death of an illusion.
name: Arthur Koestler

quote: The dead cannot cry out for justice. It is a duty of the living to do so for them.
name: Lois McMaster Bujold

quote: How strange this fear of death is! We are never frightened at a sunset.
name: George MacDonald

quote: Intellectual growth should commence at birth and cease only at death.
name: Albert Einstein

quote: Suicide is man's way of telling God, 'You can't fire me - I quit.'
name: Bill Maher

quote: Death is not extinguishing the light; it is only putting out the lamp because the dawn has come.
name: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: Life and death are illusions. We are in a constant state of transformation.
name: Alejandro Gonzalez Inarritu

quote: I am become death, the destroyer of worlds.
name: J. Robert Oppenheimer

quote: Courage is being scared to death... and saddling up anyway.
name: John Wayne

quote: Life is pleasant. Death is peaceful. It's the transition that's troublesome.
name: Isaac Asimov

quote: Art is the tree of life. Science is the tree of death.
name: William Blake

quote: Every parting is a form of death, as every reunion is a type of heaven.
name: Tryon Edwards

quote: Guilt is perhaps the most painful companion of death.
name: Coco Chanel

quote: I would rather die a meaningful death than to live a meaningless life.
name: Corazon Aquino

quote: I love the name of honor, more than I fear death.
name: Julius Caesar

quote: I believe that people would be alive today if there were a death penalty.
name: Nancy Reagan

quote: The darkness of death is like the evening twilight; it makes all objects appear more lovely to the dying.
name: Jean Paul

quote: Even in the valley of the shadow of death, two and two do not make six.
name: Leo Tolstoy

quote: Our life dreams the Utopia. Our death achieves the Ideal.
name: Victor Hugo

quote: Bravery is the capacity to perform properly even when scared half to death.
name: Omar N. Bradley

quote: Even death is not to be feared by one who has lived wisely.
name: Buddha

quote: I think life is sacred, whether it's abortion or the death penalty.
name: Tim Kaine

quote: Liberty for wolves is death to the lambs.
name: Isaiah Berlin

quote: If we don't know life, how can we know death?
name: Confucius

quote: One death is a tragedy; one million is a statistic.
name: Joseph Stalin

quote: Death and life have their determined appointments; riches and honors depend upon heaven.
name: Confucius

quote: Nothing in life is promised except death.
name: Kanye West

quote: Death makes angels of us all and gives us wings where we had shoulders smooth as ravens claws.
name: Jim Morrison

quote: Be ashamed to die until you have won some victory for humanity.
name: Horace Mann

quote: Life is a great sunrise. I do not see why death should not be an even greater one.
name: Vladimir Nabokov

quote: I'm gonna live till I die.
name: Frank Sinatra

quote: I didn't attend the funeral, but I sent a nice letter saying I approved of it.
name: Mark Twain

quote: You can change your world by changing your words... Remember, death and life are in the power of the tongue.
name: Joel Osteen

quote: The stroke of death is as a lover's pinch, which hurts and is desired.
name: William Shakespeare

quote: Let us all be brave enough to die the death of a martyr, but let no one lust for martyrdom.
name: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: I don't have no fear of death. My only fear is coming back reincarnated.
name: Tupac Shakur

quote: Without health life is not life; it is only a state of langour and suffering - an image of death.
name: Buddha

quote: Some people die at 25 and aren't buried until 75.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: It is the cause, not the death, that makes the martyr.
name: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: Give me liberty or give me death.
name: Patrick Henry

quote: Never chase a lie. Let it alone, and it will run itself to death.
name: Lyman Beecher

quote: Death is not the worst that can happen to men.
name: Plato

quote: Live your life that the fear of death can never enter your heart.
name: Tecumseh

quote: Death comes to all, but great achievements build a monument which shall endure until the sun grows cold.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: I do not agree with what you have to say, but I'll defend to the death your right to say it.
name: Evelyn Beatrice Hall

quote: If a man has not discovered something that he will die for, he isn't fit to live.
name: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: No evil can happen to a good man, either in life or after death.
name: Plato

quote: The destination is a happy life, an accomplished life that doesn't end with death but with eternal life.
name: Angelo Scola

quote: Every parting gives a foretaste of death, every reunion a hint of the resurrection.
name: Arthur Schopenhauer

quote: I am determined to offer an apology with my death.
name: Hideki Tojo

quote: No evil can happen to a good man, either in life or after death. He and his are not neglected by the gods.
name: Socrates

quote: I don't believe in death, neither in flesh nor in spirit.
name: Bob Marley

quote: I don't believe in the death penalty, but I understand personal vengeance.
name: Ian McShane

quote: Inactivity is death.
name: Benito Mussolini

quote: I'm not afraid to die, I just don't want to be there when it happens.
name: Woody Allen

quote: The first requisite for immortality is death.
name: Stanislaw Jerzy Lec

quote: A martyr can never cooperate with death, go to death in a way that they're not trying to escape.
name: Stanley Hauerwas

quote: Do the thing you fear most and the death of fear is certain.
name: Mark Twain

quote: My sister is a mess. I love her to death, but she is a mess.
name: RJ Mitte

quote: Death is the sound of distant thunder at a picnic.
name: W. H. Auden

quote: It's funny how most people love the dead, once you're dead, you're made for life.
name: Jimi Hendrix

quote: The only difference between death and taxes is that death doesn't get worse every time Congress meets.
name: Will Rogers

quote: If your best friend has stolen your girlfriend, it does become life and death.
name: Ben Kingsley

quote: Death is the golden key that opens the palace of eternity.
name: John Milton

quote: If we must die, we die defending our rights.
name: Sitting Bull

quote: Which death is preferably to every other? 'The unexpected'.
name: Julius Caesar

quote: The more you live in the present moment, the more the fear of death disappears.
name: Eckhart Tolle

quote: Pale death, with impartial step, knocks at the hut of the poor and the towers of kings.
name: Horace

quote: From my rotting body, flowers shall grow and I am in them and that is eternity.
name: Edvard Munch

quote: I have never killed a man, but I have read many obituaries with great pleasure.
name: Clarence Darrow

quote: Because of indifference, one dies before one actually dies.
name: Elie Wiesel

quote: Prior to penicillin and medical research, death was an everyday occurrence. It was intimate.
name: Katherine Dunn

quote: I support the death penalty. But I also think there has to be no margin for error.
name: George Ryan

quote: The death of a beautiful woman, is unquestionably the most poetical topic in the world.
name: Edgar Allan Poe

quote: At a formal dinner party, the person nearest death should always be seated closest to the bathroom.
name: George Carlin

quote: Death is pitch-dark, but colors are light. To be a painter, one must work with rays of light.
name: Edvard Munch

quote: The death of one man is a tragedy. The death of millions is a statistic.
name: Joseph Stalin

quote: Our dead are never dead to us, until we have forgotten them.
name: George Eliot

quote: Once writing has become your major vice and greatest pleasure, only death can stop it.
name: Ernest Hemingway

quote: Death is caused by swallowing small amounts of saliva over a long period of time.
name: George Carlin

quote: Communism possesses a language which every people can understand - its elements are hunger, envy, and death.
name: Heinrich Heine

quote: Generally speaking, the Way of the warrior is resolute acceptance of death.
name: Miyamoto Musashi

quote: A man does not die of love or his liver or even of old age; he dies of being a man.
name: Miguel de Unamuno

quote: I think in some instances that the death penalty is required.
name: Asa Hutchinson

quote: Smiles, tears, of all my life! - and, if God choose, I shall but love thee better after death.
name: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

quote: You can't reconcile being pro-life on abortion and pro-death on the death penalty.
name: N. T. Wright

quote: Death can't be considered because, if you're afraid to die, there's no room in your life to make discoveries.
name: James Dean

quote: I always say, complacency is the kiss of death.
name: Shari Redstone

quote: To the well-organized mind, death is but the next great adventure.
name: J. K. Rowling

quote: Life comes to the miners out of their deaths, and death out of their lives.
name: Mary Harris Jones

quote: Achieving life is not the equivalent of avoiding death.
name: Ayn Rand

quote: An 'unemployed' existence is a worse negation of life than death itself.
name: Jose Ortega y Gasset

quote: I have devoted my life to uncertainty. Certainty is the death of wisdom, thought, creativity.
name: Shekhar Kapur

quote: Between our birth and death we may touch understanding, As a moth brushes a window with its wing.
name: Christopher Fry

quote: Love and death are the two great hinges on which all human sympathies turn.
name: B. R. Hayden

quote: The reports of my death have been greatly exaggerated.
name: Mark Twain

quote: The day which we fear as our last is but the birthday of eternity.
name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: I were better to be eaten to death with a rust than to be scoured to nothing with perpetual motion.
name: William Shakespeare

quote: The valiant never taste of death but once.
name: William Shakespeare

quote: I intend to live forever, or die trying.
name: Groucho Marx

quote: Some people think football is a matter of life and death. I assure you, it's much more serious than that.
name: Bill Shankly

quote: One can survive everything, nowadays, except death, and live down everything except a good reputation.
name: Oscar Wilde

quote: Our life is made by the death of others.
name: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: I enjoy every climb - maybe it's because it's a literal dance between life and death.
name: Alain Robert

quote: In the long run we are all dead.
name: John Maynard Keynes

quote: Healthy children will not fear life if their elders have integrity enough not to fear death.
name: Erik Erikson

quote: We are here to laugh at the odds and live our lives so well that Death will tremble to take us.
name: Charles Bukowski

quote: There are worse things in life than death. Have you ever spent an evening with an insurance salesman?
name: Woody Allen

quote: When I die, I hope to go to Heaven, whatever the Hell that is.
name: Ayn Rand

quote: People living deeply have no fear of death.
name: Anais Nin

quote: As long as you have capital punishment there is no guarantee that innocent people won't be put to death.
name: Paul Simon

quote: The death penalty is being applied in the United States as a fatal lottery.
name: Bianca Jagger

quote: Death is just life's next big adventure.
name: J. K. Rowling

quote: Life levels all men. Death reveals the eminent.
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Nothing can happen more beautiful than death.
name: Walt Whitman

quote: Men are convinced of your arguments, your sincerity, and the seriousness of your efforts only by your death.
name: Albert Camus

quote: I postpone death by living, by suffering, by error, by risking, by giving, by losing.
name: Anais Nin

quote: A useless life is an early death.
name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Life and death. They are somehow sweetly and beautifully mixed, but I don't know how.
name: Gloria Swanson

quote: I am not afraid of death, I just don't want to be there when it happens.
name: Woody Allen

quote: Death may be the King of terrors... but Jesus is the King of kings!
name: Dwight L. Moody

quote: Death is the prerequisite to resurrection, the new life God intends.
name: John Ortberg

quote: In India we only read about death, sickness, terrorism, crime.
name: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quote: Despise not death, but welcome it, for nature wills it like all else.
name: Marcus Aurelius

quote: If you die in an elevator, be sure to push the Up button.
name: Sam Levenson

quote: The longer your life goes on, the more death you face.
name: Patrick Swayze

quote: Someone has to die in order that the rest of us should value life more.
name: Virginia Woolf

quote: Give the peasants neither life nor death.
name: Tokugawa Ieyasu

quote: Life and death. At some point we're gonna leave this world. Do I know when? Absolutely not.
name: Terrell Owens

quote: Comparison is a death knell to sibling harmony.
name: Elizabeth Fishel

quote: Love, we say, is life; but love without hope and faith is agonizing death.
name: Elbert Hubbard

quote: There is no cure for birth and death save to enjoy the interval.
name: George Santayana

quote: Racism and injustice and violence sweep our world, bringing a tragic harvest of heartache and death.
name: Billy Graham

quote: This country is being managed to death, being public related to death.
name: Kurt Vonnegut

quote: In the early days of aviation, there was a great deal of experimentation and a high death rate.
name: Elon Musk

quote: Sometimes the early bird gets the worm, but sometimes the early bird gets frozen to death.
name: Myron Scholes

quote: My fear was not of death itself, but a death without meaning.
name: Huey Newton

quote: When faith is lost, when honor dies, the man is dead.
name: John Greenleaf Whittier

quote: The death penalty is becoming a way of life in this country.
name: Dennis Miller

quote: After your death you will be what you were before your birth.
name: Arthur Schopenhauer

quote: I've looked that old scoundrel death in the eye many times but this time I think he has me on the ropes.
name: Douglas MacArthur

quote: I have no fear of death. More important, I don't fear life.
name: Steven Seagal

quote: I wish to be a martyr, and I don't fear death.
name: Muqtada al Sadr

quote: Death is not the end. There remains the litigation over the estate.
name: Ambrose Bierce

quote: Life without idealism is empty indeed. We just hope or starve to death.
name: Pearl S. Buck

quote: And suns grow meek, and the meek suns grow brief, and the year smiles as it draws near its death.
name: William Cullen Bryant

quote: Nothing is certain in life but death and taxes. And in Donald Trump's case, lies.
name: Pamela Meyer

quote: Birth and death; we all move between these two unknowns.
name: Bryant H. McGill

quote: The rise or fall of Shanghai means the birth or death of the whole nation.
name: Chiang Kai-shek

quote: When death has you by the throat, you don't mince words.
name: Friedrich Durrenmatt

quote: You'll have time to rest when you're dead.
name: Robert De Niro

quote: All architects want to live beyond their deaths.
name: Philip Johnson

quote: I have had death threats from people with fixations.
name: Enya

quote: Call no man happy before he dies, he is at best but fortunate.
name: Solon

quote: The fear of death follows from the fear of life. A man who lives fully is prepared to die at any time.
name: Mark Twain

quote: Death is a fearful thing.
name: William Shakespeare

quote: The goal of all life is death.
name: Sigmund Freud

quote: Do the thing we fear, and death of fear is certain.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Every human being is under construction from conception to death.
name: Billy Graham

quote: I look upon death to be as necessary to our constitution as sleep. We shall rise refreshed in the morning.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: When I die, I'm leaving my body to science fiction.
name: Steven Wright

quote: Sometimes I wish my first word was 'quote,' so that on my death bed, my last words could be 'end quote.'
name: Steven Wright

quote: Death and vulgarity are the only two facts in the nineteenth century that one cannot explain away.
name: Oscar Wilde

quote: I have thought there was some advantage even in death, by which we mingle with the herd of common men.
name: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Biography lends to death a new terror.
name: Oscar Wilde

quote: Absence and death are the same - only that in death there is no suffering.
name: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Fear of death makes us devoid both of valour and religion. For want of valour is want of religious faith.
name: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: It is better to risk starving to death then surrender. If you give up on your dreams, what's left?
name: Jim Carrey

quote: Death, like birth, is a secret of Nature.
name: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Know one knows whether death, which people fear to be the greatest evil, may not be the greatest good.
name: Plato

quote: Love is anterior to life, posterior to death, initial of creation, and the exponent of breath.
name: Emily Dickinson

quote: Fear of death increases in exact proportion to increase in wealth.
name: Ernest Hemingway

quote: Divorce is probably as painful as death.
name: William Shatner

quote: Life isn't fair. It's just fairer than death, that's all.
name: William Goldman

quote: There's no tragedy in life like the death of a child. Things never get back to the way they were.
name: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quote: And I will show that nothing can happen more beautiful than death.
name: Walt Whitman

quote: If my survival caused another to perish, then death would be sweeter and more beloved.
name: Khalil Gibran

quote: Must not all things at the last be swallowed up in death?
name: Plato

quote: The death of the forest is the end of our life.
name: Dorothy Stang

quote: You must not fear death, my lads; defy him, and you drive him into the enemy's ranks.
name: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: The death penalty is discriminatory and does not do anything about crime.
name: Bobby Scott

quote: I shall not die of a cold. I shall die of having lived.
name: Willa Cather

quote: Death will be a great relief. No more interviews.
name: Katharine Hepburn

quote: Life itself is but the shadow of death, and souls departed but the shadows of the living.
name: Thomas Browne

quote: I'm not afraid of death, but I'm in no hurry to die. I have so much I want to do first.
name: Stephen Hawking

quote: There is no death, only a change of worlds.
name: Chief Seattle

quote: Drown in a cold vat of whiskey? Death, where is thy sting?
name: W. C. Fields

quote: I am not made for politics because I am incapable of wanting or accepting the death of the adversary.
name: Albert Camus

quote: Death is an absolute mystery. We are all vulnerable to it, it's what makes life interesting and suspenseful.
name: Jeanne Moreau

quote: Most states in the union where the death penalty is theoretically on the books don't have executions.
name: Ruth Bader Ginsburg

quote: Our nature consists in motion; complete rest is death.
name: Blaise Pascal

quote: We should weep for men at their birth, not at their death.
name: Montesquieu

quote: I am not the born; how can there be either birth or death for me?
name: Guru Nanak

quote: Death is easier than a wretched life; and better never to have born than to live and fare badly.
name: Aeschylus

quote: Death is softer by far than tyranny.
name: Aeschylus

quote: For children preserve the fame of a man after his death.
name: Aeschylus

quote: Homeland or death! Socialism or death! We shall overcome!
name: Fidel Castro

quote: I had seen birth and death but had thought they were different.
name: T. S. Eliot

quote: To some extent I liken slavery to death.
name: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: I'm not afraid to die.
name: John Wooden

quote: Of all the gods only death does not desire gifts.
name: Aeschylus

quote: All I want is a gentleman. I'm sick to bloody death of bastards.
name: Katie Price

quote: When we have lost everything, including hope, life becomes a disgrace, and death a duty.
name: W. C. Fields

quote: Yes, I support the death penalty. It is an issue that cannot be fudged or hedged.
name: Dianne Feinstein

quote: The closer we come to the negative, to death, the more we blossom.
name: Montgomery Clift

quote: Mortality applies to every aspect of life. The fear of death is the driving fear of life.
name: Nick Tosches

quote: Death is the veil which those who live call life; They sleep, and it is lifted.
name: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quote: The charm of fame is so great that we like every object to which it is attached, even death.
name: Blaise Pascal

quote: Death is the wish of some, the relief of many, and the end of all.
name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: The appeal of cinema lies in the fear of death.
name: Jim Morrison

quote: Any business today that embraces the status quo as an operating principle is going to be on a death march.
name: Howard Schultz

quote: It is not death or pain that is to be dreaded, but the fear of pain or death.
name: Epictetus

quote: Hearing nuns' confessions is like being stoned to death with popcorn.
name: Fulton J. Sheen

quote: The body dies, but the spirit that transcends it cannot be touched by death.
name: Ramana Maharshi

quote: I'm a Ninja. I'm not scared of death.
name: Watkin Tudor Jones

quote: We know the road to freedom has always been stalked by death.
name: Angela Davis

quote: An unused life is an early death.
name: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: The rumors of my death have been greatly exaggerated.
name: Paul McCartney

quote: Pale Death beats equally at the poor man's gate and at the palaces of kings.
name: Horace

quote: Death never takes the wise man by surprise, he is always ready to go.
name: Jean de La Fontaine

quote: Other states are trying to abolish the death penalty... mine's putting in an express lane.
name: Ron White

quote: I don't want to achieve immortality through my work. I want to achieve it through not dying.
name: Woody Allen

quote: When death comes it is never our tenderness that we repent from, but our severity.
name: George Eliot

quote: I mean, Sting is one of my great buddies and I love him to death.
name: Elton John

quote: Football (soccer) is a matter of life and death, except more important.
name: Bill Shankly

quote: O Death, rock me asleep, bring me to quiet rest, let pass my weary guiltless ghost out of my careful breast.
name: Anne Boleyn

quote: In my solitude I have pondered much on the incomprehensible subjects of space, eternity, life and death.
name: Alfred Russel Wallace

quote: The compact which exists between the North and the South is a covenant with death and an agreement with hell.
name: William Lloyd Garrison

quote: The death of my father is probably the biggest thing that I ever faced. Daddy and I were best friends.
name: Joel Osteen

quote: Death to me means nothing as long as I can die fast.
name: Bob Dylan

quote: Land and sea, weakness and decline are great separators, but death is the great divorcer for ever.
name: John Keats

quote: I feel monotony and death to be almost the same.
name: Charlotte Bronte

quote: There is no such thing as death; life is only a dream, and we are the imagination of ourselves.
name: Bill Hicks

quote: Life is doubt, and faith without doubt is nothing but death.
name: Miguel de Unamuno

quote: Death comes at you no matter what you do in this life, and to equate drugs with death is a facile comparison.
name: Jerry Garcia

quote: Take care of your life and the Lord will take care of your death.
name: George Whitefield

quote: Loss and possession, death and life are one, There falls no shadow where there shines no sun.
name: Hilaire Belloc

quote: Death, so called, is a thing which makes men weep, And yet a third of life is passed in sleep.
name: Lord Byron

quote: Male privilege and entitlement are dying a very painful death; no one gives up power without a struggle.
name: Gloria Allred

quote: Drake's my little brother; I love him to death, and he's family-oriented.
name: Birdman

quote: If we heard that somebody starved to death in Sweden or Switzerland, we would be shocked.
name: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: Those who learned to know death, rather than to fear and fight it, become our teachers about life.
name: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

quote: Men should be bewailed at their birth, and not at their death.
name: Montesquieu

quote: I look forward to death with great anticipation, to meeting God face to face.
name: Billy Graham

quote: Man dies of cold, not of darkness.
name: Miguel de Unamuno

quote: I do not believe that any man fears to be dead, but only the stroke of death.
name: Francis Bacon

quote: 'Tis very certain the desire of life prolongs it.
name: Lord Byron

quote: I will never be a fan of any kind of political correctness: I think it's instant death to creativity.
name: Mads Mikkelsen

quote: Life is a banquet, and most poor suckers are starving to death.
name: Rosalind Russell

quote: If you believe in God, believe in Death Row East.
name: Tupac Shakur

quote: Life and death have been lacking in my life.
name: Jorge Luis Borges

quote: The fear of death comes from limited awareness.
name: Deepak Chopra

quote: Prepare a noble death song for the day when you go over the great divide.
name: Tecumseh

quote: No one can confidently say that he will still be living tomorrow.
name: Euripides

quote: Everything about aging in my experience so far has been a plus. Except the death part!
name: Gloria Steinem

quote: For a man who has done his natural duty, death is as natural as sleep.
name: George Santayana

quote: No one can outrun death. It will catch up to all of us eventually.
name: Billy Graham

quote: You've gotta know what death is to know life!
name: Jack Kevorkian

quote: Life and death are important. Don't suffer them in vain.
name: Bodhidharma

quote: You only live twice. Once when you are born and once when you look death in the face.
name: Ian Fleming

quote: It is impossible to experience one's death objectively and still carry a tune.
name: Woody Allen

quote: When confronted with two alternatives, life and death, one is to choose death without hesitation.
name: Yamamoto Tsunetomo

quote: Time takes the ugliness and horror out of death and turns it into beauty.
name: Dodie Smith

quote: To have the truth in your possession you can be found guilty, sentenced to death.
name: Peter Tosh

quote: Die, v.: To stop sinning suddenly.
name: Elbert Hubbard

quote: Life is but a moment, death also is but another.
name: Robert H. Schuller

quote: Always read something that will make you look good if you die in the middle of it.
name: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: We die only once, and for such a long time.
name: Moliere

quote: Death is one moment, and life is so many of them.
name: Tennessee Williams

quote: Every spiritual tradition has this idea of death and resurrection. It's not unique to Christianity.
name: Deepak Chopra

quote: Death is better than slavery.
name: Harriet Ann Jacobs

quote: Grumbling is the death of love.
name: Marlene Dietrich

quote: As far as songwriting, my inspirations came from love, life and death, and viewing other people's situations.
name: Ed Sheeran

quote: For death is no more than a turning of us over from time to eternity.
name: William Penn

quote: You look up at drama, down at comedy. A singer, looking up is okay. A comic, it's death.
name: Buddy Hackett

quote: The human consciousness is really homogeneous. There is no complete forgetting, even in death.
name: D. H. Lawrence

quote: Here I am trying to live, or rather, I am trying to teach the death within me how to live.
name: Jean Cocteau

quote: Everything that gets born dies.
name: Morrie Schwartz

quote: One must keep working continuously; otherwise, one thinks of death.
name: Enzo Ferrari

quote: Defeat the fear of death and you welcome the death of fear.
name: G. Gordon Liddy

quote: Marriage is the death of hope.
name: Woody Allen

quote: Loved. You can't use it in the past tense. Death does not stop that love at all.
name: Ken Kesey

quote: Fur is not luxury: it is an industry of death and suffering.
name: Brigitte Bardot

quote: It is neccessary to have wished for death in order to know how good it is to live.
name: Alexandre Dumas

quote: We do not celebrate the death of our enemies.
name: Yitzhak Rabin

quote: What I look forward to is continued immaturity followed by death.
name: Dave Barry

quote: Once you start doing only what you've already proven you can do, you're on the road to death.
name: Jerry Seinfeld

quote: You haven't lost anything when you know were it is. Death can hide but not divide.
name: Vance Havner

quote: Science without conscience is the death of the soul.
name: Francois Rabelais

quote: 'The Descendants' somehow made death and adultery funny at times.
name: Ashlan Gorse Cousteau

quote: Once a child is confronted with the concept of death there's a certain innocence that goes.
name: Patsy Kensit

quote: The amount of death terror experienced is closely related to the amount of life unlived.
name: Irvin D. Yalom

quote: Chicago has a strange metaphysical elegance of death about it.
name: Claes Oldenburg

quote: It is not death, it is dying that alarms me.
name: Michel de Montaigne

quote: The ceaseless labour of your life is to build the house of death.
name: Michel de Montaigne

quote: Fantasy is uni-age. You can start it in the creche, and it follows you to death.
name: Terry Pratchett

quote: Death is a very dull, dreary affair, and my advice to you is to have nothing whatsoever to do with it.
name: W. Somerset Maugham

quote: Man always dies before he is fully born.
name: Erich Fromm

quote: Not ignorance, but ignorance of ignorance, is the death of knowledge.
name: Alfred North Whitehead

quote: Do not fear death so much but rather the inadequate life.
name: Bertolt Brecht

quote: There's nothing like impending death to rouse you from existential boredom.
name: Roger Ebert

quote: We all pay for life with death, so everything in between should be free.
name: Bill Hicks

quote: Death is the only pure, beautiful conclusion of a great passion.
name: D. H. Lawrence

quote: Andrew Wood's death changed things for a few weeks. I probably got even heavier into drugs after that.
name: Layne Staley

quote: If I think more about death than some other people, it is probably because I love life more than they do.
name: Angelina Jolie

quote: I have more than once in my time woken up feeling like death.
name: Christopher Hitchens

quote: Some people are so afraid to die that they never begin to live.
name: Henry Van Dyke

quote: On the plus side, death is one of the few things that can be done as easily lying down .
name: Woody Allen

quote: When death, the great reconciler, has come, it is never our tenderness that we repent of, but our severity.
name: George Eliot

quote: In every parting there is an image of death.
name: George Eliot

quote: In the night of death, hope sees a star, and listening love can hear the rustle of a wing.
name: Robert Green Ingersoll

quote: I believe that fear of life brings a greater fear of death.
name: David Blaine

quote: A real hangover is nothing to try out family remedies on. The only cure for a real hangover is death.
name: Robert Benchley

quote: We cannot banish dangers, but we can banish fears. We must not demean life by standing in awe of death.
name: David Sarnoff

quote: At the heart of Christian faith is the story of Jesus' death and resurrection.
name: John Ortberg

quote: Let no man be called happy before his death. Till then, he is not happy, only lucky.
name: Solon

quote: But we need to quit taxing people upon death. No taxation without respiration.
name: Steve King

quote: I am reconciled to my death, but I detest the mode.
name: John Andre

quote: Good taste is death; vulgarity is life.
name: Mary Quant

quote: Death, after all, is the common expectation from birth. Neither heroes nor cowards can escape it.
name: Ellis Peters

quote: Death, they say, acquits us of all obligations.
name: Michel de Montaigne

quote: Bedouin ways were hard even for those brought up to them, and for strangers, terrible: a death in life.
name: T. E. Lawrence

quote: Why can't death - if we must have it - be always glorious, as in 'The Iliad?'
name: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: From the death of the old the new proceeds, and the life of truth from the death of creeds.
name: John Greenleaf Whittier

quote: I'm Irish. I think about death all the time.
name: Jack Nicholson

quote: Of all escape mechanisms, death is the most efficient.
name: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: To have died once is enough.
name: Virgil

quote: Life is a predicament which precedes death.
name: Henry James

quote: Those who welcome death have only tried it from the ears up.
name: Wilson Mizner

quote: Looking good and feeling like death is a difficult combination for people to understand.
name: Yolanda Hadid

quote: Nothing separates a woman or a family from God's love. Not death, and certainly not divorce.
name: Glennon Doyle Melton

quote: Not even death can take us from the eternal blessings promised by a loving Heavenly Father.
name: Joseph B. Wirthlin

quote: A friend who dies, it's something of you who dies.
name: Gustave Flaubert

quote: Death is a delightful hiding place for weary men.
name: Herodotus

quote: The wages of sin are death, but by the time taxes are taken out, it's just sort of a tired feeling.
name: Paula Poundstone

quote: I am deeply saddened by the death of my dear friend, Dudley Moore.
name: Liza Minnelli

quote: What kind of system do we have when innocent people can sit on death row for 30 years?
name: Anthony Ray Hinton

quote: Death is the cure for all diseases.
name: Thomas Browne

quote: We all labor against our own cure, for death is the cure of all diseases.
name: Thomas Browne

quote: Someone who is about to die does not mourn the dead.
name: Friedrich Durrenmatt

quote: Your chances of dying a violent death are 1/500th of what they used to be during medieval times.
name: Peter Diamandis

quote: He that fears death loses the joys of life.
name: Jan Hus

quote: When you break up, your whole identity is shattered. It's like death.
name: Dennis Quaid

quote: I've realised darkness and light are inter-dependent, just as death is an enhancer of life.
name: Tony Harrison

quote: People have not given children enough credit to understand the idea of death. But I really think they do.
name: Andrew Keenan-Bolger

quote: The aims of life are the best defense against death.
name: Primo Levi

quote: Death is always around the corner, but often our society gives it inordinate help.
name: Carter Burwell

quote: Exile is like death. You cannot understand it until it happens to you.
name: Golshifteh Farahani

quote: The coward sneaks to death; the brave live on.
name: George Sewell

quote: Nothing that is really good and God-like dies.
name: Ernst Moritz Arndt

quote: The words of a dead man are modified in the guts of the living.
name: W. H. Auden

quote: To himself everyone is immortal; he may know that he is going to die, but he can never know that he is dead.
name: Samuel Butler

quote: If death weren't around to 'finalize' the Darwinian process, we'd all still be amoebas.
name: P. J. O'Rourke

quote: I hope to die in the saddle seat.
name: Albert Ellis

quote: My father's death was the most terrible thing that happened to me in my life.
name: Judy Garland

quote: When you're dead, you're dead. That's it.
name: Marlene Dietrich

quote: Not one has shown an iota of fear of death. They want to end this agony.
name: Jack Kevorkian

quote: Cursed is the man who dies, but the evil done by him survives.
name: Abu Bakr

quote: Some men are alive simply because it is against the law to kill them.
name: E. W. Howe

quote: Since the day of my birth, my death began its walk. It is walking toward me, without hurrying.
name: Jean Cocteau

quote: If you don't have any fight in you, you might as well be dead.
name: Scott Caan

quote: I detest life-insurance agents: they always argue that I shall some day die, which is not so.
name: Stephen Leacock

quote: Dying is easy, it's living that scares me to death.
name: Annie Lennox

quote: All our knowledge merely helps us to die a more painful death than animals that know nothing.
name: Maurice Maeterlinck

quote: The death of what's dead is the birth of what's living.
name: Arlo Guthrie

quote: Any man who has $10,000 left when he dies is a failure.
name: Errol Flynn

quote: For me, habit is just a synonym for death.
name: Juliette Binoche

quote: I'll sleep when I'm dead.
name: Warren Zevon

quote: Death's in the good-bye.
name: Anne Sexton

quote: He who doesn't fear death dies only once.
name: Giovanni Falcone

quote: Hell, madam, is to love no longer.
name: Georges Bernanos

quote: Death is the tyrant of the imagination.
name: Bryan Procter

quote: He who is completely sanctified, or cleansed from all sin, and dies in this state, is fit for glory.
name: Adam Clarke

quote: Millions long for immortality who don't know what to do with themselves on a rainy Sunday afternoon.
name: Susan Ertz

quote: The timing of death, like the ending of a story, gives a changed meaning to what preceded it.
name: Mary Catherine Bateson

quote: Fling but a stone, the giant dies.
name: Matthew Green

quote: Tradition demands that we not speak poorly of the dead.
name: Daniel Barenboim

quote: Death borders upon our birth, and our cradle stands in the grave.
name: Joseph Hall

quote: We will persevere, come life or death.
name: Lewis Tappan

quote: Look for me in the nurseries of Heaven.
name: Francis Thompson

quote: It was a time when only the dead smiled, happy in their peace.
name: Anna Akhmatova

quote: Death is the last enemy: once we've got past that I think everything will be alright.
name: Alice Thomas Ellis
